Advantages.title: Boost
Advantages.details: Every week and every month, expect a fresh bonus based on your recent games. The more you play, the higher the bonuses.

Advantages.title: Dedicated VIP Host
Advantages.details: Receive your own dedicated VIP host who will support and cater to your betting needs.

Advantages.title: Recent Play Bonuses
Advantages.details: Having a rough streak of luck? Stake offers money back on losses every time you level up.

Advantages.title: Level-Ups
Advantages.details: Reach a new level and get paid. The level-ups get better the higher you go.

Advantages.title: Bespoke benefits
Advantages.details: Work with your dedicated VIP host to tailor benefits to your gaming needs.

general.title: Why is Stake’s VIP program the best?
general.content: Stake’s VIP program is often rated as one of the best online casino experiences due to the amount of bonuses we give out to players. Additionally, our award winning support team is online 24/7 to answer any questions you have. We have the highest customer satisfaction rate out of many online casinos where we have amassed a community of some of the most passionate gamblers across the globe.
